main: ^Havin' trouble rememberin', cowpoke? How's about a refresher:
^, those tendrils o' yours will shoot out like a lasso. When ya grab somethin', it follows your cursor until you let go.
^If your cursor is over the thing you're dropping, it will stay put. If it ain't, you'll launch it in the direction of your cursor.
^Why don't you give it a try?
